Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Pexidartinib hydrochloride is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Tenosynovial giant cell tumor. It is used in certain adults who have symptoms associated with a severe form of the disease that is not likely to get better with surgery.

Section.Para: Pexidartinib hydrochloride is only available as part of a special program called Turalio REMS (Risk Evaluation and Mitigation).
Pexidartinib hydrochloride is also being studied in the treatment of some types of cancer and other conditions.
